original_title: The Lawrence Arms: An Evening of Extraordinary Circumstance
overview: A concert film that documents punk band The Lawrence Arms' 10th anniversary show. The show was recorded at The Metro in the band's hometown of Chicago in 2009.
tagline: Basically, the An Evening of Extraordinary Circumstance DVD is a TLA fan's wet dream. Yep, we said it.
title: The Lawrence Arms: An Evening of Extraordinary Circumstance
